channel.title: Federal Bureau of Investigation on ECTHRwatch
channel.description: Recent content in Federal Bureau of Investigation on ECTHRwatch

item.title: FBI Victim Assistance Program
item.description: Source: FBI Victims of Crime brochure The FBI’s Commitment to Victims of Crime Each year, the FBI investigates thousands of crimes involving hundreds of thousands of victims, including many child victims. These crimes result in great harm to individuals, families, and communities. Individuals impacted by crime face the daunting task of rebuilding and healing from loss while navigating the criminal justice system. Federal laws protect victims of Federal crime and provide them with a voice during the investigation and prosecution of their case.

item.title: Email sent to Adam ROGALSKI (State Department, FBI) and Mahonri MANJARREZ (FBI) in which I give examples of the serious frauds the transnational criminal enterprise McDonald’s Corporation and/or its affiliated companies committed.
item.description:
Key point of this event: the F.B.I. is now formally notified of some of the crimes I am accusing McDonald’s Corporation and/or its subsidiary companies of.

On 2022-03-11, I sent 3 emails to the F.B.I.

This is the third email which was sent at 19:38 Beijing time. It was sent to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez.

From: [Key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy]

TO : [Mr. Rogalski’s username]@state.gov

TO : [Mr. Manjarrez’s username]@fbi.gov

SUBJECT: 3 concrete examples of aggravated frauds

item.title: Email sent to the F.B.I. about Xi Jinping (习近平), the President of the People’s Republic of China, and Li Keqiang (李克强), the Premier of the State Council of the People’s Republic of China.
item.description:
On 2022-03-11, I sent 3 emails to the F.B.I.

This is the second email which was sent at 16:36 Beijing time. It was sent to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez. It’s about the XiJinping.fr and LiKeqiang.org websites.

From: [Key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy]

TO : [Mr. Rogalski’s username]@state.gov

TO : [Mr. Manjarrez’s username]@fbi.gov

SUBJECT: XiJinping.fr and LiKeqiang.org

item.title: Email sent to Messrs. Rogalski (Assistant Legal Attaché, U.S. Department of State, F.B.I.) and Manjarrez (F.B.I.) informing them that I am now resuming my explanations.
item.description:
On 2022-03-11, I sent 3 emails to the F.B.I.

This is the first email which was sent at 15:32 Beijing time. It was sent to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez.

From: [Key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy]

TO: [Mr. Rogalski’s username]@state.gov

TO: [Mr. Manjarrez’s username]@fbi.gov

SUBJECT: Now resuming my explanations of the aggravated crimes McDonald’s committed

item.title: Federal Bureau of Investigation
item.description: Federal Bureau of Investigation I am going to seek Victim Assistance (White-Collar Crime (aggravated consumer fraud by McDonald’s Corporation and/or its affiliated companies plus money laundering), also victim of Cyber Crime (Computer Intrusion)) and witness protection from the Federal Bureau of Investigation. I am going to explain in further details why later. I also intend to ask for witness protection to the European Court of Human Rights and to the Chinese Central Government. You can read my open letters to the F.

item.title: Mahonri MANJARREZ
item.description: Mahonri MANJARREZ Federal Bureau of Investigation My communications to Mr. Manjarrez are published on Mahonri-Manjarrez.Federal-Bureau-of-Investigation.com.

item.title: Adam ROGALSKI
item.description: Adam Rogalski Federal Bureau of Investigation Assistant Legal Attaché My communications to Mr. Rogalski are published on Adam-Rogalski.Federal-Bureau-of-Investigation.com.

item.title: Answer sent to Messrs. Rogalski (Assistant Legal Attaché, U.S. Department of State, F.B.I.) and Manjarrez (F.B.I.)
item.description:
From: [Key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy]

TO: [Mr. Rogalski’s username]@state.gov

TO: [Mr. Manjarrez’s username]@fbi.gov

Answer sent by email to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez on October 05, 2021, at 01:20 (am) Beijing time.

item.title: Christopher Asher WRAY
item.description: Check carefully who monitors the F.B.I. since Christopher Asher WRAY declared, if I am not mistaken, that he had a financial stake in McDonalds Corporation. Possible conflict of interests. Therefore, just to be safe, I should also notify other officials. It’s one of the biggest fraud in history. We can’t leave anything to chance. For the sake of transparency, open letters to Mr. Wray will be published on Christopher-Asher-Wray.com.
